summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A cyclist and a scooter rider are ahead, moving in the same direction. The cyclist suddenly falls off the bike, causing a potential hazard. The pedestrian on the left side of the road is walking towards the scene.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the cyclist and scooter rider. As the cyclist falls off the bike, the vehicle needs to decelerate to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: Cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, falls off the bike, causing a potential hazard. 2) Front: Scooter rider, approximately 7 meters away, moving steadily. 3) Left side: Pedestrian, approximately 10 meters away, walking towards the scene.
